input.sentences: they knew that dead tree stumps was a great place to find mushrooms .
fallen | rotted logs was another good spot .

output.sentences: We went looking for a good tree in the woods.
This tree won't do because it is covered in moss.
Along the way we saw a lot of mushrooms.
Some of the mushrooms were weird looking.
Some of the mushrooms were cute.
